column4: How do I figure out what's going on here? -> dnsmasq: failed to create listening socket for port 53: Permission denied
what exactly are you trying to do?
permission denied sounds like no root rights, you running firestarter as root?
did you try same settings without firestarter?
you could try gufw to test if its really a firestarter problem
please repost your question, the real experts are in the house now
just stick around a few, there's always a solution for anything
not all wifi cards support adhoc: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Adhoc#Supported_Cards
does your laptop have a broadcom wifi card?
thats really weird..there's gotta be a conf somewhere right and logs
